articles.description: Reporting on Fintech, Crypto, and Blockchain Activity in Africa
articles.content:
Ghana’s annual consumer inflation rose to 50.3% in November, up from 40.4% the previous month, the country’s chief statistician, Samuel Kobina, announced.
